entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16.
